name: Idiopathic Membranous Nephropathy with Secondary Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis
chief_complaint: My legs are swollen, and I feel extremely tired all the time
prognosis: Guarded - 40% progress to ESRD within 10 years despite treatment
description: A complex glomerular disorder featuring both membranous nephropathy and FSGS patterns, likely representing either two concurrent pathologies or FSGS developing secondary to long-standing membranous nephropathy. The condition leads to massive proteinuria and progressive renal dysfunction.
risk_factors: Exposure to certain medications (NSAIDs, gold salts)
multiple_choice: Idiopathic Membranous Nephropathy with Secondary Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis
